channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-8260] create generic integration test for trunk and 94 that is more deterministic, can be run for longer and is less aggressive
item.summary: create generic integration test for trunk and 94 that is more deterministic, can be run for longer and is less aggressive

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Patches for both versions... This test is intended mainly for regular runs on 94, because the normal aggressive test with CM fails relatively frequently on 94 due to AM and other issues that are not going to be fixed resulting from complicated sets of circumstances when CM actions overlap (which this test avoids), and depending on the order of actions (also avoided for first half of the test).
Both should have 3 servers, will fix as part of CR feedback
0.94 just passed for me on ec2

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12576901/HBASE-8260-v0.patch
against trunk revision .

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 8 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop2.0. The patch compiles against the hadoop 2.0 profile.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 1.3.9) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.wal.TestLogRolling

The only minor nit is the spelling error in the class name CompositeSequenialPolicy. I guess you meant to name the class CompositeSequentialPolicy. Other than that +1.

Will rename the class on commit and commit tomorrow if there are no further objections.
Lars Hofhansl are you ok with adding this test to 94?
Yep. New code, test only. Perfect

Integrated in HBase-TRUNK #4020 (See https://builds.apache.org/job/HBase-TRUNK/4020/)
